overview: Hotel masseuse Jelena Jensen wants more of Dillion Harper’s boobs and offers the guest her services. When Chloe Lynn is treated to a massage by her boyfriend’s ex Dillion Harper, the masseuse convinces her of his ploy to have a threesome, so they do, minus him. French client Anissa Kate discovers masseuse Tiffany Tyler masturbating in the bathroom and gratifies her in her native tongue. When newly single Marie McCray visits the spa for a shave and massage, lesbian masseuse Raven Rockette eats her freshly shorn pussy. Natasha Voya gets a pain in her neck during a fun weekend in the country, so Remy LaCroix gives her a contact massage, releasing tension in their pussies too.
title: At First Sight
